entry.title: [ann] Live Bitcoin Core commits on #bitcoin-commits
entry.summary: Wladimir, a member of the Bitcoin community, has announced that interested individuals can now join #bitcoin-commits on freenode to receive notifications of commits to the bitcoin/bitcoin repository. The announcement was made in a message directed to all members of the community. He expressed appreciation to Luke-Jr for guiding him through the setup process. This development will enable users to stay up-to-date with the latest developments and changes to the Bitcoin codebase.
